All Classes

Class Description
Card
Represent a card from an ordinary 52-card deck, including a rank, a suit, and whether the card is face-up or face-down.
CardImages
Manage a set of playing card images loaded from a directory of image files.
CardStack
A CardStack is an object that displays a collection of cards.
FoundationStrategy
This PileStrategy encapsulates the rules for a foundation pile in Klondike.
Game
An implementation of this interface provides a starting point for playing a particular variation of solitaire.
GameFrame
A GameFrame is the main window for one instance of a Solitaire game.
GUIDemo
A simple demonstration of using Piles on a Table.
KlondikeGame
An implementation of the single-card-draw version of Klondike solitaire.
Main
Main class for the solitaire application.
Packet
A Packet is a CardStack that contains a collection of cards currently being dragged.
Pile
A Pile is a CardStack located on a game Table.
PileStrategy
A PileStrategy permits customization of the behavior of a Pile in response to various actions (clicks and drag/drops).
Rank
Represent the rank of an ordinary playing card, ace through king.
StockStrategy
This PileStrategy encapsulates the rules for the stock pile in Klondike.
Suit
Represent the suit of an ordinary playing card: clubs, diamonds, hearts, or spades.
Table
Manage a collection of Piles for a card game, and route mouse actions (click, move, and drag/drop) to them.
TableauStrategy
This PileStrategy encapsulates the rules for a tableau pile in Klondike.
WasteStrategy
This PileStrategy encapsulates the rules for the waste pile in Klondike.
